channel.title: Demonstrations on RWC Productions
channel.description: Recent content in Demonstrations on RWC Productions

item.title: SAM:DATA vs Dr. Mal Ware 2
item.description: SAM:DATA vs Dr. Mal Ware 2: Saving Your Friend’s Computer From Being Taken Over By An Evil Overlord, or How to Defeat the Evil Doctor Again is an epic continuation of the original SAM:DATA vs Dr. Mal Ware game series.

item.title: NLS Game Engine
item.description: This engine represents the “Next Logical Step” in engine design, utilizing the component-based entity system design pattern, modular core loading, and a centralized message system.

item.title: Aperture Attack
item.description: interNational Geographic wants you to be their next world-renowned photographer. As your first step, they have sent you to their training facility to evaluate your skills by giving you shots of objects that you need to find and take good photos of as fast as possible. Hurry up, the clock’s already ticking!

item.title: Children of the Arkon: The Journey Back
item.description: Just as your squadron of XR10 star-fighters clear the hangar, an enemy Destroyer fires a powerful laser pulse deep into the reactor core of your mothership, the Alliance Defense Frigate Arkon.

item.title: Kakra Racing
item.description: Kakra Racing was an online team project completed after only eight weeks of development in June of 2011 as part of the GSP-360 course offered by DeVry University.
